com.kontakt.sdk.android.factory

Class AdvertisingDataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.factory.AdvertisingDataController

  • public final class AdvertisingDataController
extends Object
    AdvertisingDataController extracts necessary data from propagated Beacon's advertising package frame and describes devices . For more information see Advertising Packet structure and ForceScanConfiguration.
    See Also:
    kontakt.io knowledge base - Advertising packet structure, Bug no 65863 - Andoroid Open Source Project
